briefTitle: Compassionate Treatment of Patients With Inborn Errors of Bile Acid Metabolism With Cholic Acid
officialTitle: Investigation in the Pathogenesis of Liver Disease in Patients With Inborn Errors of Bile Acid Metabolism
summary:
OBJECTIVES:

I. To Evaluate the therapeutic efficacy of cholic acid during provision of compassionate treatment to patients with identified inborn errors of bile acid synthesis and metabolism

II. To assess the safety and tolerability of cholic acid

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Excretion of Atypical Bile Acids in Urine by Category
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline, then every 1, 3, or 6 months (depending on protocol version) for an average of 2.8 years
